## Day 4 Task Question 3

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

diamond <- diamonds
ggpairs(diamond)

head(diamond)
tail(diamond)
summary(diamond)
skim(diamond)

ggplot(data = diamond, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(data = diamond, aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(data = diamond, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
